svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: The levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) from onshore wind, given in 2016 USD per kilowatt-hour (kWh). This is given
as the annual weighted average across in the world, in addition to select countries where data is available.
